Summary Having worked in the IT industry for more than 20 years, I am now an integration consultant, specialising in the WebSphere stream of IBM tools. I have a whole wealth of experience from my mainframe days as a systems programmer, working on UNIX as a DBA (Oracle and Sybase) to my current extensive, contracting experience with WebSphere. 
 
My last 10 years have been working on different platforms with MQSeries from version 2 to its current version 7.5, and Message Broker from its early days as NEON to MQSI version 1 and all the way through to its current version 8 and now IIB 9. 
 
I am certified in MQ and Message Broker, have written papers, taught for IBM and others and am co-author of an IBM Redbook on Message Broker. 
 
Specialties: WebSphere Message Broker, WebSphere MQ, IIB 
XML, XSD, WSDL & SOAP 
Vairous UNIX and Linux and shell scripting 
Sybase, Oracle and DB2

Summary Fernando has more than 17 years of experience in software architecture, design and development, proactively contributing for some best projects created at various customers.  
He has experience of working in the UK, Portugal and France for the last 17 years and his experience includes large scale enterprise application integration, design and development of middleware solutions. 
He is a team builder called to mentor, provide best practices and aid colleagues. He has spent the past 12 years working as WebSphere Business Integration (WBI) Consultant and is recognized as an established expert. His last projects have been implemented using WebSphere Process Server (WPS) 6.x and Business Process Manager (BPM) 8.0.1. 
In Portugal, he was Technical Director of Research, heading a team of 20 people (in a company of 400), due to his expertise in architecting and developing complex multi-tiered Internet applications; his proficiency in Unix and database administration and team work skills. 
 
Expertise: 
• WebSphere Integration (12 years): EAI/BPM, WESB Mediations, WebSphere Adapters, WebSphere MQ (clustering, MQ triggers, connectivity to AS/400 and z/OS), WebSphere ICS (CrossWorlds) and WebSphere MB 
• WebSphere Process Server (7 years): Architecture, Design and Development 
- Business Processes: IBM BPM, WPS and WID, Rules, Micro flows 
- Human Workflow: WPS Long Running BPELs, Human Tasks, HTM APIs, Web Interfaces 
• Proven working experience in Large to Very Large projects 
• Business Areas: Banking, Insurance, Logistics, Retail, Oil & Chemical 
• Migration from WICS 4.3 to WPS 6.x and from WPS 6.x to BPM 8.0 Advanced 
• WebSphere TX integration into WESB/WPS/BPM (WTX 8.x, dtxpi.jar, WTX primitive) 
• Java Coding (14 years): JSE, J2EE and frameworks 
• WebSphere Administration: installation and clustering, deployment, JMX and Jython scripting 
• Database Administration (DB2, Oracle) and Development 
• Team Leadership and Team Mentoring
